```{stata}
*| include: false
local hide_answers : env HIDE_ANSWERS
if (`hide_answers') {
    scalar hide_answers_open = "::: {.content-hidden}"
    scalar hide_answers_close = ":::"     
}
else {
    scalar hide_answers_open = " "
    scalar hide_answers_close = " "
}
```

`{stata} scalar(hide_answers_open)`

```{stata}
display "Hidden"
```

`{stata} scalar(hide_answers_close)`

```{stata}
display "Shown"
```
